message: Talk about stepping over the line. My son has a peanut allergy, and Oreos are one of the few cookies he can have.

The Democratic party has made itself a sad joke. To rig a national election, to suppress American voters then get caught red handed, have the DNC head resign in disgrace, and within hours get hired by the Clinton campaign. This is the largest scandal in American history plain and simple. Well the Democratic party doubled down on what I consider a unelectable candidate none the less. It is my opinion that Hillary Clinton can not beat Donald Trump in election and rightfully so after shitting on our democracy. So with that say goodbye to democracy, to liberty and to the great nation we once knew. No self respecting person can vote for Hillary Clinton with the amount of fraud and scandals linked to her entire campaign. I'm not a religious man... but God save us all from these two presidential candidates. I am truly frightened and furious at the prospect of one of these two being elected president.

For those of you who say """" Why are these people in France?"""" Ummmm...I dunno...why was France colonizing some of their countries so long? Why didn't FRANCE """" stay where it belonged"""" and not exploit these countries to the point of creating problems that lead to some of this immigration? Please don't tell me Charlie Hebdo targeted only """" radical Muslims"""". One look at the cartoons shows you they were out to insult ALL muslims. How is drawing Mohammed naked with a star on his butt insulting only to """" radical"""" Muslims? """"Mohammed """"may be in a place where he is beyond being harmed by a stupid drawing, but the drawings were also a political and symbolic """"stand-in"""" for the Muslim community, the adherents of which, unlike those of Catholicism in France, are minorities currently in a much weaker position to defend themselves. Stop being so shallow and look at the real situation. PS...freedom of speech in France didn't seem to include mocking DeGaulle and Sarkozy's son. So the French must worship those two people.
